popup.popupLint: Click on the resource button and choose its parameters

dashHint.name: About DASH / FLV / MP4
dashHint.desc: Do not modify this casually. If you really need to, please read {0} first and make sure you know what you are doing.

error.checkUpdate: Check the latest updates on GitHub
error.selectLimit: It is not recommended to select more than 30 items at once

updater.title: New version available!
updater.hint: You can disable "Auto Check Updates" in "Settings → General", but it is not recommended

search.suggest: What would you like to search today?

settings.title: Settings
settings.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.

clipboard.name: Clipboard Monitor
clipboard.desc: If enabled, automatically detects Bilibili links in clipboard and shows a dialog.

dialog.title: Bilibili Content Detected
dialog.detected: Detected the following Bilibili content from clipboard

notify.name: Notification
notify.desc: If enabled, a system notification will be sent when a download finishes.

auto_download.name: Auto Start Download
auto_download.desc: If enabled, downloads start automatically after adding tasks.

paths.name: Paths
paths.desc: "Temp Files" hold incomplete downloads, which are moved to "Output Files" after processing.

cache.name: Cache
cache.desc: The database stores settings, login info, download records, etc. Regular backups are recommended.

default.name: Default Options
default.desc: These will be used first during download. If not supported, the highest available option will be used.

task_folder.name: Create "Subfolders"
task_folder.desc:
If enabled, each task will be stored in its own subfolder following the subfolder naming format.
If disabled, no subfolders will be created and files will be stored flat in the top-level folder.

max_conc.name: Max Concurrent Downloads
max_conc.desc: Controls how many tasks run at once. Higher values may increase risk of being flagged.

add_metadata.name: Embed Metadata into Audio Files
add_metadata.desc: If enabled, metadata will be automatically embedded when downloading audio files.

block_pcdn.name: Try Blocking PCDN
block_pcdn.desc: If enabled, higher-quality links will be used instead of PCDN.

danmaku.name: Convert XML Danmaku to ASS
danmaku.desc: If enabled, XML danmaku will be converted to ASS format via DanmakuFactory.

mp3.name: Convert Audio to MP3
mp3.desc: If enabled, audio will be forcibly converted to MP3. Audio+Video unaffected.

naming.name: Naming Format

info.title: About
info.paid: This software is a free, public-benefit project. If you paid for it, you may have been scammed.
info.star: If you find this useful, please give the project a Star on GitHub!
info.data: All generated and fetched data is stored locally on your device only.
